long_description: Built to shield you from the sun's intense rays, the Outdoor Research Aquifer Sombrero offers comfort and coverage while you're hoofing it up the trail or enjoying a float down the river. Lightweight, moisture-wicking nylon/polyester fabric is soft and durable; brim includes foam for flotation; internal headband keeps sweat out of your eyes. Adjustable, removable chin strap helps secure the hat in gusty weather. UPF 50+ sun protection. Outdoor Research Aquifer Sombrero features a 4 in. brim.
short_description: Built to shield you from the sun's intense rays, the Outdoor Research Aquifer Sombrero offers comfort and coverage while you're hoofing it up the trail or enjoying a float down the river.
